mapper.insert: insert into dz_salary( id, userId, salaryDate, excelTitleId, excelData, addTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{userId}, #{salaryDate}, #{excelTitleId}, #{excelData}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_salary set userId=#{userId}, salaryDate=#{salaryDate}, excelTitleId=#{excelTitleId}, excelData=#{excelData}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,userId,salaryDate,excelTitleId,excelData,addTime,status from dz_salary where status != '-1' order by id desc
